items.Help_Description_1: The information about the attributes used in the strategy game “Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War – Soulstorm” is located on this resource.
items.Help_Description_2: You can suggest corrections/additions at Issues GitHub page.
items.Help_Description_3: In the background, there is a depiction of a scene from the “Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine (2011)” game.
